mapper.select: select * from sys_college_pattern_file u left join (select v.time_id,v.college_id from sys_org_prac_stu u left join sys_org_college_prac v on u.org_id = v.org_id and u.prac_id = v.org_prac_id where u.STATUS = 4 and u.stu_id = #{userId} and u.deleted = 0) v on u.time_id = v.time_id and u.college_id = v.college_id
